effects.1: There’s little left of your body save the droppings left behind when it was digested.
effects.2: You’ll make a poor feast for crows. Others have already dined too well on you.
effects.3: To call what happened to your body butchery is an insult to the butcher’s art. This is savagery.
effects.4: You are a now just a thing of cracked bone, masticated flesh, and chewed gristle.
effects.5: Entrails spill from your sliced belly like noodles in an overflowing bowl, betraying a grisly end.
effects.6: Ghastly marks of tooth and claw reveal your harsh demise.

effects.1: You’ll make a poor feast for crows. Others have already dined too well on you.
effects.2: To call what happened to your body butchery is an insult to the butcher’s art. This is savagery.
effects.3: You are a now just a thing of cracked bone, masticated flesh, and chewed gristle
effects.4: Entrails spill from your sliced belly like noodles in an overflowing bowl, betraying a grisly end.
effects.5: Ghastly marks of tooth and claw reveal your harsh demise.
effects.6: Your corpse is largely intact and ready for a noble funeral.

condition_recovery: You are mortally wounded. You die unless healed to 1 hp within 1 round. If you are healed, you need 1 month of bed rest.

effects.1: Your spine is broken at the neck when your throat was torn open (DEX reduced to 3, cannot move, fight, use items, or cast spells, must make Death save each month or die from complications).
effects.2: Your spinal cord is snapped the waist where the beast tore you down (as per legs torn off, cannot reproduce, and must make Death save each year or die from complications).
effects.3: Both legs are torn off (DEX reduced to 3 for AC purposes, two crutches required, movement reduced by 60’, cannot force march).
effects.4: Both arms are torn off (cannot climb, use weapons or items, open locks, remove traps, or similar actions).
effects.5: Your eyes are a delicious treat (blinded, -4 attack throws, no LOS, movement reduced to ¼ normal, -2 to surprise rolls)
effects.6: Your lips and tongue have been chewed off hideously (mute, cannot speak, cast spells, or use magic items involving speech, and -4 to reaction rolls).

condition_recovery: You are grievously wounded. You die unless healed to 1 hp within 1 turn. If you are healed, you need 2 weeks of bed rest.

effects.1: More than half your face has been gnawed off, including an eye, an ear, and all of your nose (as per eye clawed out, ear bitten off, and gruesome scarring)
effects.2: Your intestines are mangled and ruined (must rest for 2 turns of 6, CON reduced by 1/3, -4 to save vs. poison, chronic indigestion and flatulence cause  -4 to reaction rolls).
effects.3: One leg is torn off (crutch is required, movement reduced by 30’, DEX reduced by 1/3 for AC purposes).
effects.4: One arm is ripped off (cannot climb, use shields, dual wield, or use two-handed weapon).
effects.5: One eye is clawed or pecked out (-2 to missile attack throws).
effects.6: You narrowly avoided having your throat torn out (raspy voice, -2 to throws involving speech)

condition_recovery: You are critically wounded. You die unless healed to 1 hp within 1 day. If you are healed, you need 1 week of bed rest.

effects.1: Almost half your face has been mauled, including an eye and ear (as per eye clawed out and ear bitten off).
effects.2: Your scrotum has been chewed offed or your womb gnawed upon (cannot reproduce, -3 to reaction rolls if loss of manhood / womanhood is known).
effects.3: One foot is chewed off (peg required, movement reduced by 30’, DEX reduced by 1/3 for AC purposes)
effects.4: One hand is bitten off (cannot dual-wield or use two-handed weapons).
effects.5: Your neck carries the marks of terrible bites (notable scarring).
effects.6: The fang marks on your neck are only somewhat visible (minor scarring).

condition_recovery: You are shock. You recover with 1 hp. You need magical healing and one night of bed rest, or 1 week of rest.

effects.1: Your nose is bitten off and your lips chewed to ruin, leaving your visage monstrous (gruesome scarring).
effects.2: Your ear is bitten off (-1 to Listening throws and -1 to surprise rolls).
effects.3: 1d3 toes on one foot are bitten off (3 lost toes on one foot makes foot useless).
effects.4: 1d3 fingers on one hand are bitten off (3 lost fingers on one hand makes hand useless.)
effects.5: The smallest finger on one hand is bitten off (3 lost fingers on a hand makes it useless).
effects.6: Ghostly visions of lost companions flicker before your eyes as you awaken.

condition_recovery: You were knocked out. You recover with 1 hp. You need magical healing or one night of bed rest.

effects.1: Your ragged and savage wounds heal stiff and scarred (-1 to all initiative rolls).
effects.2: Your calf aches where it was almost chewed through (cannot force march unless mounted).
effects.3: Your neck carries the marks of terrible bites (notable scarring).
effects.4: A nasty-looking fang mark suggests your hand almost got bitten off (minor scarring).
effects.5: Ghostly visions of lost companions flicker before your eyes as you awaken.
effects.6: A vision of the afterlife haunts you, then fades as you awaken.

condition_recovery: You were just dazed. You recover immediately with 1hp. You do not need any bed rest.

effects.1: You suffer lasting wounds that ache in bad weather (-1 to initiative in Frigid, Drizzly, or Rainy weather).
effects.2: Your cheek is marred by the scars of great claws and fangs (notable scarring).
effects.3: A claw to the cheek leaves a mark (minor scarring).
effects.4: Ghostly visions of lost companions flicker before your eyes as you awaken.
effects.5: A vision of the afterlife haunts you, then fades as you awaken.
effects.6: The Choosers of the Slain pass you by, and you awaken.
